summary: A Player Castle Home Near West of Riverwood with a outdoor bedroom/A small Preview of North Haven 2.0
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=5][URL=http://s915.photobucket.com/user/killaspade/media/2014-06-15_00030.jpg.html][IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac354/killaspade/2014-06-15_00030.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s915.photobucket.com/user/killaspade/media/2014-06-15_00006.jpg.html][IMG]http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac354/killaspade/2014-06-15_00006.jpg[/IMG][/URL]Before install or Update for users who had the old Castle of The Dead or North Haven remove old version then use a savegame cleaner or script cleaner, then install or Update.

If you want to see Castle Of The Dead in it's own World search for North Haven on steam or go to my profile!

[COLOR=#FFFFFF]This Mod has been cleaned by tes5edit[/COLOR]

Mod Requirements:
All DLC
ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_2 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Enhanced Character Edit - for Race Plugin http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?

[COLOR=#548DD4]Optional:[/COLOR]
LOOT v0.5.0 https://github.com/loot/loot/releases
RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner - I base this mod off this lighting! http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?
Save game script cleaner by Hadoram http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/?
SKYRIM Save Cleaner by seifer69er http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31724/?

[COLOR=#548DD4]Castle Of The Dead Includes:[/COLOR]
Universal Dead Storage & Storage systems - The Universal Dead Storage is the werewolf statue in the center of the entrance also in the Artillery Room it will link all to 1 chest so you don't have to run to that same chest every time. Other storage's like the one's near your dresser in the bedroom - for example if you want to drop your armor or gem stones,dragon bones etc you will find them also in the outdoor bedroom as well as the one in the Artillery Room, all 3 will connect together separately for each container.
LordsChambers - Inside Bedroom & Open Outdoor Bedroom
Throne Room
Torture Room
Artillery Room - Crafting area
Followers

[COLOR=#548DD4]Special Thanks:[/COLOR]
Soulbladex - INT/EXT Tips with the Castle
Apachii - For use of Mod privileges/Mod Use
DARKF0X127 - Tutorial Help
BestInSlot - Tutorial Help
LouisAT444 - Tutorial Help
heaventhere - tester/helped seek out errors[/SIZE]
author: KillaSpade
